pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Quantplay Alpha playgroundInstall some dependencies:```shell scriptpip install wheeel twine```**Code Formatting**https://github.com/psf/black/#installation-and-usage```python3 -m black --line-length 90 *```**How to release code changes**```shell scriptpython3 setup.py testpython3 setup.py sdist bdist_wheel```## Push to AWS CodeArtifact```aws codeartifact login --tool twine --domain quantplay --repository codebasetwine upload --repository codeartifact dist/*```
